meanings.definition: A person who shares a house or apartment with others.
meanings.sent1: My housemates and I take turns cooking dinner each night.
meanings.sent2: The housemates in the apartment building organized a movie night.
meanings.sent3: The housemates decided to have a friendly competition to see who could clean their room the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Living with housemates is like having built-in friends right at home.
meanings.sent5: Having housemates can make splitting rent and chores much easier.

meanings.definition: The people who live together in a house or apartment.
meanings.sent1: Our housemates always have fun game nights on Fridays.
meanings.sent2: The housemates in the shared house all get along really well.
meanings.sent3: One of our housemates is always losing their keys, it's become a running joke in the house.
meanings.sent4: The bond between housemates can be as strong as family.
meanings.sent5: Housemates often become like a second family when living together.
